## Properties

| Property        | Attribute        | Description                                         | Type                        | Default     |
| --------------- | ---------------- | --------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------- | ----------- |
| `allowMultiple` | `allow-multiple` | Allow multiple sections to be open at the same time | `boolean`                   | `false`     |
| `items`         | `items`          | The accordion items                                 | `AccordionItem[] \| string` | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event             | Description | Type               |
| ----------------- | ----------- | ------------------ |
| `accordionChange` |             | `CustomEvent<any>` |
